TEXT.English: We have accomplished our second Historical Goal. A Golden Age has begun for our civilization!
TEXT.French: Nous avons accompli notre deuxième objectif historique. Un âge d'or débute pour notre civilisation !
TEXT.German: Wir haben unsere zweite historische Siegbedingung erfüllt. Ein Goldenes Zeitalter für unsere Zivilisation hat begonnen!
TEXT.Italian: We have accomplished our second Historical Goal. A Golden Age has begun for our civilization!
TEXT.Spanish: We have accomplished our second Historical Goal. A Golden Age has begun for our civilization!

TEXT.English: First to discover technologies in the %s1 era
make sure that there are %s1 in the world
make sure that there are %s1 in secular civilizations
make %s2 the most populous city in the world
make %s2 the most culturally advanced city in the world
establish a trade connection with another civilization
make sure that %s1%% of the world is controlled by %s3 civilizations
Make contact with a European civilization before any European civilization discovers America
make sure that %s1 are settled in %s3 civilizations
make sure that %s1 are settled in secular civilizations
convert to %s1 %s2 turns after its foundation
have an average city culture of %s1
be the first to discover %s1 era technologies
control the core of another European civilization
be the first to found a city in %s2
acquire %s1 gold by pillaging, conquering cities and sinking ships
create an overland trade route from any city in China to one of your Mediterranean ports
have the largest population in the world
have an average city population of %s1 or more
have at least %s2 relations with %s1 independent European civilizations
build a railway connection in your territory from Moscow to the Siberian coast
be the first civilization to complete %s1
have %s2 relations with %s1 other communist civilizations
have open border agreements with %s1 civilizations
have open border agreements with %s1 European civilizations
have all of %s1 in your territory
have more culture than all European civilizations combined
acquire %s1%% of the votes in the Apostolic Palace
acquire %s1 gold through the slave trade
control %s1%% of the world's commerce between you, your vassals and allies
control %s1%% of the world's military power between you, your vassals and allies
connect your capital to an Atlantic port by railroad
connect your capital to a Pacific port by railroad
control all cities and 90% of the territory in Canada without ever conquering a city
have %s2 relations with %s1 civilizations with a Jewish minority
control the %s1 most cultured cities in the world
make sure there are no %s1 civilizations in the world
make sure at least half of all civilizations are Protestant or Secular
control the %s1 largest cities in the world
have the highest approval rating in the world for %s1 turns
have %s1 or better relations with all civilizations
have the highest life expectancy rating in the world for %s1 turns
allow no more than half of your cities to have a religion
control the cathedrals of all religions
make %s2 the city with the most wonders in the world
make %s2 the city with the highest trade income in the world
control at least half as much gold as all other civilizations combined
make %s2 the city with the most settled great people in the world
be the first to create three different kinds of great people
have your cities celebrate for %s1 turns

TEXT.French: La cité qui scintille sur la colline
La ville que désirait le monde
Le soleil ne se couche jamais
Les merveilles de la mer Égée
La compagnie néerlandaise des Indes orientales

TEXT.English: All the World Under One Roof
TEXT.French: Le monde entier sous un même toit
TEXT.German: Die gesamte Welt unter einem Dach
TEXT.Italian: All the World Under One Roof
TEXT.Spanish: All the World Under One Roof

TEXT.French: La théorie du vol d'oies sauvages
